description:
Officer Log: A remote single-room warehouse on the outskirts of the city was discovered
after a missing-person report led investigators to the location.
The main entrance door was locked from the outside using a metal chain.

Inside the room, a single chair was positioned at the center,
with restraints attached to its arms.
Multiple blood stains were observed beneath and behind the chair,
along with drag marks extending toward a side exit.

A blunt metal rod and a length of rope were found discarded near the wall.
Several empty water bottles and food wrappers were scattered on the floor,
suggesting the victim may have been held at the location for an extended period.

Footprints of different shoe sizes were identified near the entrance,
while only one distinct footwear pattern led away from the side exit.
No firearms were recovered at the scene.


Visual Forensics Data:

suspect_hypotheses.reason: Standard statistical profile for this weapon type.
Alternative: impulsive action typically associated with younger demographics.

timeline.reason: Absence of suspect; open exit paths
